long_description: Feel the miles float by with the Mountainsmith Apex 80 pack. This expedition workhorse is loaded with high-performance features, organization and carrying comfort for your backcountry adventure. Innovative hipbelt, lumbar pad and dual-density shoulder straps enhance the body's ability to bear weight on the hips and lumbar and offer a comfortable ride on the shoulders. Open spinal column runs the length of the upper torso, allowing perspiration and heat to escape; elevated foam pods with air channels on either side wick moisture. Spacious main compartment is crowned by a detachable top lid that converts into a lumbar pack or shoulder sling; webbing underneath the top lid secures rope or accessories. Hydration-compatible design features a drink tube exit port for on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately); dedicated sleeping bag compartment makes it easy to catch Zs. The Mountainsmith Apex 80 pack features front and side accessory pockets, dual water bottle pockets, tool/trekking pole mounts and quick-release compression straps.
